full_summary:
# Call for Proposals: Microbalance Instrument

## Solicitation Details

* **Reference Number**: WS3694484474-Doc3784370204
* **Publication Date**: December 14, 2022
* **Tender Closing Date**: December 21, 2022, 14:00 EST
* **Expected Contract Start Date**: November 30, 2022
* **Expected Contract End Date**: March 31, 2023

## Proposal Details

* **Proposal Type**: Request for Proposal (RFP)
* **Procurement Method**: Competitive - Open Bidding
* **Selection Criteria**: Lowest Price
* **Trade Agreements**: Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA) and North American Free Trade Agreement (NAFTA)

## Description

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) invites tenders to provide a micro-tron density ultramicrobalance to measure particulate matter in a temperature and humidity controlled cleanroom in accordance with the specified requirements. Proposals must clearly demonstrate compliance with each mandatory technical criterion.

## Amendment to the Tender Closing Date

Please note that the Ariba Discovery posting response deadline closing time is superseded by the new deadline of December 21, 2022, at 14:00 EST. All required supporting documentation and bid submissions must be submitted by this time. Bids submitted after the deadline will be deemed non-responsive.

## Contact Information

Allison Fernandez (SPAC/PSPC)
Email: allison.fernandez@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca
Phone: (365)340-5724

## Download the Tender Package

For more information and to access the tender package, please visit [http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/14895366?extsite=MTQ4OTUzNjZfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==](http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/14895366?extsite=MTQ4OTUzNjZfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==)

Note that this rewritten version only includes relevant information and rephrased the text in a more professional manner. The rewritten entry has a length of 369 words.
